to give you extra context: for server side inference we have folly::ThreadLocalPtr being used to make it thread safe. @jerryzh168 implemented a custom version for Caffe2 and is about to ship it.

once that is in, we should be able to open-source the code. What is the urgency for this on your side? We can also share some preliminary code with you once we strip out folly dependency. So you could get your self familiar with the code and contribute.

body:
to give you extra context: for server side inference we have folly::ThreadLocalPtr being used to make it thread safe. @jerryzh168  implemented a custom version for Caffe2 and is about to ship it. 

once that is in, we should be able to open-source the code. What is the urgency for this on your side? We can also share some preliminary code with you once we strip out folly dependency. So you could get your self familiar with the code and contribute.
